projects.name: Diet.ai
projects.description: Diet.ai is your ultimate companion in achieving your health and wellness goals through customized daily diet recipes. By leveraging advanced artificial intelligence, Diet.ai tailors meal plans that align with your unique nutritional needs and preferences, making healthy eating effortless and enjoyable.

projects.name: Running Pace Planner
projects.description: It helps users calculate the pace required for each kilometer of running. This project is built by using React (Material-UI and Recharts).

projects.name: todoloh
projects.description: todoloh let user to create a todo-list. The created todo-list will be saved into local file with .tdl extension. User can also upload the .tdl file and make changes on it.

projects.name: SpaceGen | The Trail to Mars: Can you keep your crew alive
projects.description: An educational game which targets at 10 â€“ 14 middle schoolers to teach them the risks and hazards faced during human spaceflights.

projects.name: Water Quality Testing Device by using sensors and image processing
projects.description: A water quality testing device which uses sensors and camera to obtain the water quality data. The data will then be translated to useful information and saved in the device itself and the cloud storage.

projects.name: Swiftlet Detection with Computer Vision and Machine Learning
projects.description: A swiftlet detection system by using image processing techniques and support vector machine (SVM). The swiftlet detection system contains a server, several client cameras, and a web-based user interface.
